scripts.prepublish: npm run bundle && npm run bundle-min
scripts.bundle-min: rm -f dist/aws-v4-sign-small.min.js && browserify index.js | uglifyjs --compress --mangle - > dist/aws-v4-sign-small.min.js && gzip -k -f dist/aws-v4-sign-small.min.js
scripts.bundle: rm -f dist/aws-v4-sign-small.js && browserify index.js -o dist/aws-v4-sign-small.js && gzip -k -f dist/aws-v4-sign-small.js
scripts.dev: nodemon --exec npm run bundle && npm run bundle-min
